comment:
Have you got color in your cheeks?
Do you ever get that fear that you can't shift
The tide that sticks around like something in your teeth?
Are there some aces up your sleeve?
No idea that you're in deep
I dreamt about you nearly every night this week
How many secrets can you keep?
'Cause there's this tune I found
That makes me think of you somehow
And I play it on repeat
Until I fall asleep
Spilling drinks on my settee
Do I wanna know
If this feeling goes both ways?
It's sad to see you go
Sorta hoping that you'd stay
Darlin', we both know
That the nights are mainly made
For sayin' things that you can't say tomorrow day
Crawling back to you
Ever thought of callin' when you've had a few?
'Cause I always do
Maybe I'm too
Busy being yours to fall for somebody new
Now, I've thought it through
Do I wanna know
If this feeling goes both ways?
It's sad to see you go
Was sort of hopin' that you'd stay
Darlin', we both know
That the nights are mainly made
For saying things that you can't say tomorrow day
Oh, crawlin' back to you
Ever thought of callin' when you've had a few? (Goes both ways)
'Cause I always do
Maybe I'm too (was sort of hopin' that you'd stay)
Busy being yours to fall for somebody new (goes both ways)
Now, I've thought it through (had a few)
Crawlin' back to you (was sort of hopin' that you'd stay)
Ever thought of callin' when you've had a few? (Goes both ways)
'Cause I always do
Maybe I'm too (was sort of hopin' that you stay)
Busy being yours to fall for somebody new (flows both ways)
Now, I've thought it through
Crawlin' back to you (was sort of hopin' that you'd stay)
Ever thought of callin' when you've had a few? (Goes both ways)
'Cause I always do

If you're reading this right now, I just want to say; I'm rooting for you. Weâ€™re strangers, but that doesnâ€™t mean I donâ€™t care. I know what itâ€™s like to feel like you're pushing a boulder uphill. I felt that way until I picked up Manifest the Unseen by Luna Rivers I canâ€™t explain it perfectly, but it changed my whole perspective. After checking it out on youtube and reading it things have been flowingâ€”money, peace, confidence. Maybe this is your moment too. Stay open. Wishing you more than you ever imagined! ğŸ’«ğŸ’°

So many people praised this book Manifest the Unseen by Luna Rivers that I finally had to see for myself. No regrets whatsoever this book genuinely opened my eyes.
